profileSummaries.name: Metadata sharing
profileSummaries.description: The technology under test is able to share metadata with other members of the cohort.

requirementSummary.name: Cohort registration
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test is able to register with a cohort.

requirementSummary.name: Repository connector
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test provides a connection to a valid repository connector.

requirementSummary.name: Metadata collection id
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test broadcasts a unique metadata collection identifier.

requirementSummary.name: Supported type queries
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test is able to respond appropriately to queries about its supported types.

requirementSummary.name: Supported type notifications
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test is able to sent out notifications for its supported types.

requirementSummary.name: Support for consistent types
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports entity, relationship and classification types that link together.

requirementSummary.name: Metadata instance access
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the retrieval of the current state of specific metadata instances from its repository.

requirementSummary.name: Entity property search
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the search and retrieval of current metadata instances from its repository based on matching specific property values.

requirementSummary.name: Entity value search
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the search and retrieval of current metadata instances from its repository based on matching any values.

requirementSummary.name: Entity condition search
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the search and retrieval of current metadata instances from its repository based on matching logical combinations of property conditions.

requirementSummary.name: Instance notifications
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test sends out events when metadata changes in its repository.

requirementSummary.name: Instance versioning
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports incrementing version numbers within metadata instances as they change.

requirementSummary.name: Type enforcement
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test ensures metadata instances conform to their type definition.

requirementSummary.name: Unsupported type errors
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test will not create metadata instances for unsupported types.

requirementSummary.name: Type conflict management
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test receives/handles and sends type conflict events when type errors are detected.

requirementSummary.name: Reference copy storage
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the storage of metadata instances from other repositories in the cohort.

requirementSummary.name: Reference copy locking
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test ensures metadata instances from other repositories can not be updated.

requirementSummary.name: Reference copy delete
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test ensures that references copies are removed from its repository with integrity when the master copy is deleted.

requirementSummary.name: Entity lifecycle
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports requests to create, update and purge entity instances.

requirementSummary.name: Classification lifecycle
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports requests to create, update and purge classification instances.

requirementSummary.name: Relationship lifecycle
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports requests to create, update and purge relationship instances.

requirementSummary.name: TypeDef add
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the addition of new type definitions.

requirementSummary.name: TypeDef maintenance
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the commands to change a type definition.

requirementSummary.name: Entity neighborhood
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the ability to query metadata instances that radiate from a specific entity instance through multiple hops.

requirementSummary.name: Connected entities
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the ability to query the entity instances that are connected to a specific entity instance.

requirementSummary.name: Linked entities
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the ability to locate the metadata instances that connect two entity instances together.

requirementSummary.name: Historical property queries
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the point in time search and retrieval of metadata instances from its repository based on specific property values.

requirementSummary.name: Historical value queries
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the point in time search and retrieval of metadata instances from its repository based on arbitrary values.

requirementSummary.name: Store entity proxies
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the storage of metadata instances that are proxies for instances from other repositories in the cohort.

requirementSummary.name: Retrieve entity proxies
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the command to retrieve a proxy instance of a metadata instance.

requirementSummary.name: Entity proxy locking
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test ensures metadata instances that are proxies for instances from other repositories can not be updated.

requirementSummary.name: Retrieve entity proxies
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test ensures that proxy instances are removed from its repository with integrity when the master copy is deleted.

requirementSummary.name: Soft-delete instance
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the command to change the type of a metadata instance to either its super type or a subtype.

requirementSummary.name: Undelete instance
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the command to change the type of a metadata instance to either its super type or a subtype.

requirementSummary.name: Incremented version number on restore
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test ensures a restored instance has an incremented version number.

requirementSummary.name: Return previous version
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the command to restore the previous version of an instance.

requirementSummary.name: New version number on undo
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test ensures a restored instance has an incremented version number.

requirementSummary.name: Update instance identifier
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the command to change the unique identifier (guid) of a metadata instance mastered in its repository.

requirementSummary.name: Send reidentified event
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the broadcasting of instance re-identified events to other members of the cohort.

requirementSummary.name: Process reidentified event
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the receipt/processing of instance re-identified events from other members of the cohort.

requirementSummary.name: Update instance type
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the command to change the type of a metadata instance mastered in its repository to either its super type or a subtype.

requirementSummary.name: Send retyped event
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the broadcasting of instance re-typed events to other members of the cohort.

requirementSummary.name: Process retyped event
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the receipt/processing of instance re-typed events from other members of the cohort.

requirementSummary.name: Update instance home
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the command to update the metadata collection id for a metadata instance.

requirementSummary.name: Send re-homed event
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the broadcasting of instance re-homed events to other members of the cohort.

requirementSummary.name: Process re-homed event
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the receipt/processing of instance re-homed events from other members of the cohort.

requirementSummary.name: Relationship property search
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the search and retrieval of current relationship instances from its repository based on matching specific property values.

requirementSummary.name: Relationship value search
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the search and retrieval of current relationship instances from its repository based on matching any values.

requirementSummary.name: Relationship condition search
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the search and retrieval of current metadata instances from its repository based on matching logical combinations of property conditions.

requirementSummary.name: Advanced property search
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the use of regular expressions within match properties to search for entity instances.

requirementSummary.name: Advanced property search
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the use of regular expressions within value search criteria to search for entity instances.

requirementSummary.name: Relationship advanced property search
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the use of regular expressions within match properties to search for relationship instances.

requirementSummary.name: Relationship advanced value search
requirementSummary.description: The technology under test supports the use of regular expressions within value search criteria to search for relationship instances.

profileSummaries.name: Reference copies
profileSummaries.description: The technology under test is able to save, lock and purge reference copies of metadata from other members of the cohort.
